namespace.ui:title: namespace
namespace.ui:help: The target namespace for the Pod

nodeName.ui:title: nodeName
nodeName.ui:help: The node Name is used to deploy on specific node e.g insiscsdt-3176

image.ui:title: Image
image.ui:help: The image name to use for the pod, for example nginx:alpine

cpuLimit.ui:title: CPU limit
cpuLimit.ui:help: The container's CPU spec, for example 500m

memoryLimit.ui:title: Memory Limit
memoryLimit.ui:help: The container's CPU spec, for example 128Mi

gpuLimit.ui:title: GPU Limit
gpuLimit.ui:help: The container's GPU spec, for example 1

volumeName.ui:title: Volume Name
volumeName.ui:help: Specify a name for your Volume e.g pv-storage

mountPath.ui:title: mountPath
mountPath.ui:help: Specify a mountPath for your volume e.g /usr/share/nginx/html

pvcClaimName.ui:title: persistent Volume Claim Name
pvcClaimName.ui:help: Mention the name of your persistent volume claim (PVC)
